synopsis.text: Unbeknown st to the Hime clan, the fantastical realm of Amawakuni has not seen the birth of a female heir for decades, forcing them to disguise their son Arata as a girl to maintain their grip on the throne. As the coronation ceremony unfolds, Arata becomes the prime suspect in the murder of the previous princess, forcing him to flee into the treacherous Kando Forest. Meanwhile, in modern-day Japan, a high school student named Arata Hinohara, tormented by his classmates, stumbles upon an alley that transports him to Amawakuni. As the two Aratas switch places, Hinohara finds himself in a world of danger and intrigue. Now, Hinohara must not only clear Arata's name but also fulfill the last wish of the slain princess by exposing her killers. In this strange new world, Hinohara discovers his hidden power as a 'Sho' and embarks on a journey to restore order, accompanied by newfound allies. As Arata struggles to find a way back to their respective worlds, Hinohara must navigate the customs and challenges of Amawakuni, learning the true meaning of friendship and loyalty along the way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
